articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site Souvenir Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site Souvenir Factory
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site Souvenir Factory.
					 Kim Jong Un learned in detail about the situation of the factory and gave an instruction to turn it into a factory producing not only souvenirs but also various consumer goods by remodeling it as required by the new century and installing modern zipper, melamine resin goods and other production processes in addition and took a step for doing so.
					
					 He looked round the room dedicated to the history of the factory. The factory, founded in December 1979 on the personal initiative of leader Kim Jong Il and under his meticulous guidance, produces not only souvenirs for visitors to revolutionary battle sites and historic sites, the eternal treasures of the Korean revolution, but also various kinds of daily necessities.
					
					 Recalling that leader Kim Jong Il highly appreciated the products of the factory during his visit to the venue of the Pyongyang City exhibition of light industrial goods in August 1984, Kim Jong Un said the officials and employees of the factory should never forget the trust and loving care shown by the leader.
					
					 Then, he went round the zipper production process, melamine resin goods production process, souvenir production process, sample room and other parts of the factory to acquaint himself in detail with the production of goods and their quality.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the factory newly arranged a modern technical process capable of mass-producing plastic and metal zippers needed for bags, footwear and sporting goods and started its operation.
					
					 He said it became possible to provide the children and students of the country with bags made of domestic cloth and zipper as a home-grown bag cloth production process was installed at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and a Korean-style zipper production process arranged at the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site Souvenir Factory.
					
					 The factory has an important duty to perform, he said, advancing the tasks facing it.
					
					 He said he was very pleased to see the emergence of another mass consumer goods producer based on domestic technology and materials.
					
					 And he had a photo session with the officials and employees of the factory, expressing his belief that they would fully discharge their responsibility and duty in the efforts to improve the people's standard of living.
					
					 Accompanying him were Vice-Chairman O Su Yong, Department Director An Jong Su and Vice Department Directors Jo Yong Won and Pak Myong Sun of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Swiss Government Decides Emergency Aid to Flood-hit Areas in DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Government Decides Emergency Aid to Flood-hit Areas in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Swiss government decided to render emergency aid to the DPRK in connection with the flood damage that hit the areas in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province.

articles.title: Member of Foreign Affairs Committee of British Labor Party Visits Pyongyang
articles.content:
Member of Foreign Affairs Committee of British Labor Party Visits Pyongyang
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Glyn Ford, member of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the British Labor Party, visited the Mangyongdae Children's Camp.
					 He went round various places of the palace which has turned into a comprehensive extracurricular education base for schoolchildren.
					
					 He also toured the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory, the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory, etc.

articles.title: Delegation of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and Its Members Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and Its Members Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and its members visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the story about the historic old home in Mangyongdae, the guests went round historical relics preserved with much care.
					
					 They also looked round revolutionary mementoes on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They toured the National Gifts Exhibition House, the Nature Museum, the Central Zoo and the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Nigeria, on the occasion of the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned by Amos Elisha, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Nigerian Embassy here, on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were handed to an official concerned on Friday by Military, Naval and Air Attache of the Chinese embassy here Zhang Ping who is doyen of the military attaches corps.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Members of missions of the WHO, WFP and UN FAO here laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them on Friday on the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Delegation of Central Court Returns Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Central Court Returns Home
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Central Court of the DPRK headed by Vice-President Ri Myong Nam returned home on Friday after attending the international jurist forum held in Vladivostok, Russia.

articles.title: Participants in Pyongyang Int'l Conference Visit Sci-Tech Complex
articles.content:
Participants in Pyongyang Int'l Conference Visit Sci-Tech Complex
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Pyongyang International Conference for Promoting Sustainable Development visited the Sci-Tech Complex on Friday.
					 They made a bow to an art piece depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il displayed at the complex.
					
					 Being briefed on the complex built grandiosely and fashionably as a symbol of the Juche-based art of architecture in the 21st century and great seat of learning for all people, they went round application sci-tech hall, children's dream hall, e-reading room, etc.
					
					 They also toured e-library of Kim Il Sung University, the Tower of the Juche Idea and the Central Nursery of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection.

articles.title: National Exhibition of IT Successes 2016 Closes
articles.content:
National Exhibition of IT Successes 2016 Closes
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The national exhibition of IT successes 2016 closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Friday.
					 Introduced there were many achievements and data made in researches to put the production processes on an IT basis. Among them were combined production and control systems, management information systems, programs for flexible manufacturing system, programs for supporting education and information and communication means.
					
					 There were introduction of achievements and experience of advanced units and brisk technological exchange to introduce latest technology.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Chung Gil, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, officials concerned and officials and working people of relevant units.
					
					 The results of jury were published at the ceremony.

articles.title: Shock Brigade Movement Brisk in Flood-hit Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Shock Brigade Movement Brisk in Flood-hit Areas of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Young people in North Hamgyong Province, the DPRK have conducted the shock brigade movement in its flood-hit areas.
					 The number of its participants reaches over 104 000.
					
					 They have performed such great feats as restoring hundreds of dwelling houses, rebuilding railway, bridges and roads in 120 sections covering more than 110 000 meters and completing the embankment in scores of sections.
					
					 Taking the lead in building dwelling houses are those in Hoeryong City, Kyongwon, Musan and Kyonghung counties.

articles.title: Army-People Great Unity, Might of Songun Korea
articles.content:
Army-People Great Unity, Might of Songun Korea
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK have made great achievements with one accord in restoring the flood-hit northern part of the country's North Hamgyong Province, turning adversity into favorable situation for the people. 
					 Servicepersons and people have pooled their efforts to speed up the rebuilding of roads and bridges and construction of schools, kindergartens, hospitals and dwelling houses.
					
					 It is the traditional traits and most valuable wealth of Songun Korea to win victories, closely rallied around the leader.
					
					 The unity between the revolutionary army and people was the source of might which brought to victory the armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists with neither state-backing home front nor assistance of a regular army to accomplish the historic cause of national liberation and inflicted ignominious defeat upon the U.S. imperialists under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Under the Songun revolutionary guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, the Korean People's Army had demonstrated its invincible might in defending socialism and building an economic power and the Korean people brought about with full confidence the revolutionary upsurge in ushering in a new era of building of a socialist power during the Arduous March, the forced march.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the army-people unity has been further consolidated to turn the whole country into a unit of genuine comrades-in-arms more closely rallied around him.
					
					 Now, the army and people have turned out as one in the drive for recovering the flood-hit areas in hearty response to the appealing call of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to demonstrate once again the invincible power of the army-people unity.

articles.title: Greetings to Meeting of Educators of Chongryon
articles.content:
Greetings to Meeting of Educators of Chongryon
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Friday sent a message of greeting to the meeting of educators of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) for marking the 70th anniversary of the enforcement of the general secondary education of Koreans in Japan. 
					 The message said that the enforcement of the general secondary education of Koreans in Japan was a historic event that made it possible to transform into a reality the ardent desire of Koreans in Japan to let their children learn the Korean language, history and culture and to firmly carry forward the lifeline of the Juche-oriented Korean movement in Japan by bringing up the new generations as patriotic talents, virtuous and knowledgeable.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 During the past period, officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan won the right to national education, achieved national unity of compatriots from all walks of life centered on the school, brought up the new generations to be ardent patriots contributing to the country and the nation and reliable successors to patriotic cause, thereby setting the world's shining example in the education of overseas compatriots despite harsh suppression and persistent obstructions by the reactionaries at home and abroad.
					
					 Officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan should fulfill the sacred duty of guaranteeing the eternal foundation of patriotic cause of Chongryon, while regarding the work of democratic and national education as the lifeline and mainstay for the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Expressing belief that the meeting will be brilliantly recorded as a historic one that would usher in a new heyday of national education by thoroughly embodying supreme leader Kim Jong Un's idea of attaching importance to education and talents in the overall work of national education, the message wished the meeting success in its work.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Can Never Escape Final Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Can Never Escape Final Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The hysteric sanctions and pressure on the DPRK on the part of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are no more than futile frenzy of those failing to understand the invincible capability and tremendous potentials of the great Paektusan nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have nothing to fear as they have turned out in the drive for building an invincible thriving nation, confident of the validity and victory of their cause under the guidance of the great Party, though they may face more blatant challenge and harsher sanctions and blockade than before.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' ever harsher sanctions against the DPRK and their frantic moves to stifle it are as foolish as precipitating their self-destruction.
					
					 It is the firm will of the army and people of the DPRK to make a clean sweep of the group of traitors and achieve the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 It is hard to expect peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula and the nation is bound to suffer a war disaster as long as the puppet group of traitors are allowed to go reckless in their moves to ignite a nuclear war in collusion with outside forces, dead-set against national reconciliation and unity. 
					
					 To mercilessly wipe out the war maniacs is an entirely just option for safeguarding the country and the nation, protecting peace and security on the peninsula and achieve the national reunification, the cherished desire of the Koreans.
					
					 The U.S. and puppet forces will meet a miserable end and the Korean nation will greet a new dawn of national reunification in the life-and-death battle to involve all matchless military forces built up under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Measures for Bolstering up Its Capability for Self-Defence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Measures for Bolstering up Its Capability for Self-Defence
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- VOA and UPI, etc. reported recently it is a big problem that right now the U.S. has no way of preventing  unforeseeable tough measures of the DPRK. They added: It conducted the ground jet test of a new type high-power engine of a carrier rocket for geo-stationary satellite. Given the case in the DPRK where once an instruction is given by leader Kim Jong Un, it is implemented as a law, a satellite may be launched in the near future.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a commentary:
					
					 All monumental structures built on this land and eye-opening achievements made in the field of defence science and technology in recent years to stun even military powers are products of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 A lot of wealth created by the DPRK despite the U.S. imperialists' constant threat of military aggression and the harshest sanctions in history provides a convincing proof that sanctions can never work on the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has never been free from sanctions.
					
					 Even at this moment, the U.S. ruling quarters are racking their brains to seek the most effective sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 But, this would get them nowhere.
					
					 The DPRK is not afraid of any sanctions to be slapped by the U.S. No matter how desperately the U.S. may work, the DPRK's strategic position as a nuclear power will never change.
					
					 It is the DPRK's stand that it would neither waver nor step back even an inch from the road of bolstering up its capability for self-defence.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the reality and ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its sanctions and blockade.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Denounced for Trying to Turn "Holy Land" into Battle Field
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Denounced for Trying to Turn "Holy Land" into Battle Field
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea issued a statement on Friday lashing out at Park Geun Hye for finally deciding to deploy THAAD at the Songju Golf Course in North Kyongsang Province where "holy land" of Ronal Buddhism is located despite strong protest and condemnation from south Korean people of different social standings.
					 For believers, "holy land" is inviolable as a spiritual mainstay and a sacred place for praying.
					
					 Park's introduction of nuclear war means into "holy land" of Ronal Buddhism, symbol of reconciliation, unity and peace is the evilest action putting even Asura in the shade, the statement said.
					
					 Branding the Park Geun Hye group of traitors' reckless intrusion into "holy land" of Ronal Buddhism as intolerable insult to Ronal Buddhists and brazen-faced killing of religionists, the statement went on:
					
					 Park Geun Hye unhesitatingly offers as a U.S. military base to stifle the fellow countrymen in the north even the religious "holy land" which should be specially sanctified and protected. This once again proves that she is a pro-U.S. lackey and cruel, immoral and corrupt human butcher without an equal.
					
					 If THAAD deployment by the evils is not checked, the "holy land" of Ronal Buddhism will be removed by rogues today and religious belief will be totally trampled down tomorrow and the whole country, the cradle for the Koreans, will be reduced to big powers' theatre of fierce scramble and shambles of a nuclear war.
					
					 That is why Ronal Buddhists in south Korea are turning out in the struggle against THAAD deployment in the death-defying spirit, declaring that Park Geun Hye's behavior is little short of a declaration of intrusion into the "holy land" of Ronal Buddhism.
					
					 The south Korean religionists' struggle against THAAD deployment is a sacred war of justice and patriotic action to protect the "holy land", peace and security on this land and usher in a new era of independent reunification, unanimous aspiration and desire of all Koreans.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea extends full support and solidarity to the Ronal Buddhists in their struggle to protect the "holy land" and expresses belief that all the religionists of south Korea who love justice and peace will turn out in the struggle to hold in check THAAD deployment by crazy Park Geun Hye, trouble-maker, and drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea, irrespective of faith.
					
					 The wicked gangs keen to desecrate the "holy land" and turn it into a battle field are bound to meet divine punishment.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Decision to Deploy THAAD Near "Holy Land" of Ronal Buddhism under Fire
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Decision to Deploy THAAD Near "Holy Land" of Ronal Buddhism under Fire
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Religious Believers Council of Korea released a statement Friday lashing out at Park Geun Hye of south Korea for recently deciding to deploy THAAD, source of aggression and war, near the "holy land" of Ronal Buddhism.
					 The Council of Religionists for Peace comprising seven religious orders in south Korea released a statement protesting against the lethal weapons on the "holy land" of religion which prioritizes peace and Catholicism, Confucianism, Songgyungwan, Christianity, Buddhism and other religious circles have turned out together with Ronal Buddhism in the struggle against THAAD deployment which Park is pushing forward, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Their dynamic struggle against the evil of the times is due obligation and just deed of the religionists who love justice and peace and value faith.
					
					 The "holy land" of religion has been sacred all times and places and the faith of the religionists and their pilgrimage to it are inseparable from each other. Therefore, Park's decision to deploy THAAD in it amounts to a crackdown on religion and violation of faith and pilgrimages.
					
					 Not content with using government power against religious facilities without hesitation, outmatching the fascist temper of her father who was an ill-famed "yusin" dictator, she is now working hard to introduce the war asset even into the "holy land." If her frenzy is unchecked, justice and peace will be wrecked and the nation is bound to suffer a nuclear war disaster.
					
					 All south Korean religionists who value love, peace and justice should never pardon the moves of Park Geun Hye, sycophant, traitor and confrontation manic, to deploy THAAD but courageously turn out in the struggle to flush out the U.S. forces, stumbling block lying in the way of national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification.
					
					 The Religious Believers Council of Korea expresses expectation and belief that the south Korean religionists including Ronal Buddhists will continue their valiant actions against THHAD deployment to protect the "holy land."

articles.title: Typhoon Hits S. Korea
articles.content:
Typhoon Hits S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A typhoon hit several areas of south Korea on Wednesday, according to south Korean MBC, KBS and CBS.
					 Four people have so far been reported dead and three missing due to the recent typhoon that swept the whole areas of south Korea including Jeju Island.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Call for Paving Avenue to Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Call for Paving Avenue to Independent Reunification
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. issued a statement on Oct. 5.
					 The statement warmly supported the appeal to all Koreans sent by the participants in a cycling journey for reunification of the Chinese regional preparatory committee for the joint meeting of the political parties, organizations and individual personages in the north, the south and abroad for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It said: In order to pave a wide avenue to independent reunification, the U.S. and the south Korean authorities should stop at once all drills for preemptive nuclear attack which may ignite a war obstructing the national reconciliation and unity.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Slams U.S., South Korean Warmongers' Saber-rattling
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Slams U.S., South Korean Warmongers' Saber-rattling
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, the on-line paper of Koreans in the U.S., in an article contributed by Jang Kwang Son, member of the Editorial Board, lashed out at Obama and Park Geun Hye for pressurizing various countries to downgrade the level of ties with the DPRK and put pressure on it by leaving no means untried.
					 This is nothing but an indication that they would ignite a war against the DPRK, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S., not content with letting south Korea, Japan and other marionettes slap sanctions against the DPRK to pressurize it, is now working hard to buildup public opinion in a bid to ignite a war while talking about the qualifications of the DPRK as a member nation of the United Nations.
					
					 All Koreans should turn out in the struggle to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty and thus force the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to halt their saber-rattling.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Switzerland
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Switzerland
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on October 1 with the approach of the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present at the seminar were Martin Lotscher, chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, and personages of the group and other people.
					
					 Martin Lotscher said Kim Jong Un in his work noted that the history of WPK is the proud course in which it led the Korean revolution to victory being responsible for destiny of the people under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, explaining the main contents of the work in detail.
					
					 Speakers praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for building the WPK into the invincible revolutionary party, genuine leading political organization.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The WPK devotedly served the people takings its roots deep among them. Herein lies the key to the WPK's leadership over the cause of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of H.E. Kim Jong Un the WPK is pursuing the politics for the people, valuing, respecting and loving them. The WPK will surely build the prosperous, strongest and best country, making the sacred history of the people-first doctrine.

articles.title: Party-Building Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded by Myanmar Figures
articles.content:
Party-Building Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded by Myanmar Figures
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Myanmar figures issued statements on Oct. 1 and 3 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 71st founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 Maung Maung Naying, director general of the Myit Tar Moe Publishing House of Myanmar, said:
					
					 The WPK has developed into the invincible and steel-strong party thanks to the wise guidance of HE Kim Jong Il who had perfectly embodied the revolutionary idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and has enjoyed boundless trust by the revolutionary parties and people as it made special contributions to victoriously advancing the cause of global independence with Songun politics.
					
					 The august name of HE Kim Jong Il will shine along with the WPK.
					
					 Today the WPK has greeted a fresh turning point under the guidance of HE Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, said that the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who led the WPK and made the brilliant and fresh history in accomplishing the cause of global independence are deeply recorded in the mind of the progressives.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Only victory and glory will always be in store for the WPK developed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and being led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 I am convinced that the DPRK will certainly be a socialist power in the near future as it has the WPK being led by Kim Jong Un and the service personnel and people united around it.

articles.title: WPK's Founding Anniversary to Be Marked in Bangladesh
articles.content:
WPK's Founding Anniversary to Be Marked in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A Bangladeshi preparatory committee for celebrating the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed on Oct. 2.
					 Mostafa Jamal Haider, secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events on the anniversary.

articles.title: Central Zoo in Pyongyang Introduced by TASS
articles.content:
Central Zoo in Pyongyang Introduced by TASS
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- TASS introduced the Central Zoo in the DPRK on October 3.
					 Noting the number of animals is increasing in the zoo remodeled at the best level, it said:
					
					 Many animals have found their home in the zoo.
					
					 Among them are Humboldt penguins.
					
					 A Russian figure presented those rare birds to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un sent them to the Central Zoo.
					
					 The zoo having 40 odd animal sheds modernly built to match the environment is drawing a lot of people every day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Published in Germany
Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee was published in booklet by the Azzawi Media Print in Berlin with the approach of the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on September 30.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Souvenir
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Souvenir
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio  en terreno la Fabrica de Souvenir del Lugar de Interes Historico-Revolucionario de Mangyongdae.
					Luego de averiguar detalladamente el estado de la planta, el Presidente presento la tarea de renovarla de acuerdo con la demanda del nuevo siglo y disponerla tambien de los modernos procesos de produccion de cremallera y de articulos plasticos de melamina, convirtiendo asi la fabrica en una unidad que fabrica no solo los souvenir, sino tambien los articulos de consumo popular, y tomo las medidas para cumplirla.
					
					El Presidente estuvo en la sala de presentacion del historial. 
					
					La fabrica, levantada en diciembre de 1979 bajo la iniciativa directa y la direccion minuciosa del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, produce los recuerdos para los visitantes a los lugares de batalla revolucionaria y otros de interes historico-revolucionario, patrimonios eternos de la revolucion coreana, y otros articulos de uso diario necesarios a la vida del pueblo.
					
					La Fabrica de Souvenir del Lugar de Interes Historico-Revolucionario de Mangyongdae es una planta nacida bajo la orientacion del Dirigente, senalo Kim Jong Un y recordo que  al recorrer la exposicion de articulos de industria ligera de la ciudad de Pyongyang realizada en agosto de 1984, el Dirigente evaluo altamente los productos hechos en la fabrica. Y encomendo que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica no deben olvidar ni un momento la confianza y el amor del Dirigente.
					
					Recorriendo los procesos productivos de la cremallera, los articulos plasticos de melamina y la de souvenir, la sala de muestras y otros puntos, el Presidente hizo detallado conocimiento del estado de produccion y la calidad de las mercancias.
					
					Expreso una gran satisfaccion de que la fabrica acondiciono nuevamente los modernos procesos tecnicos capaces de producir en gran cantidad las cremalleras plasticas y metales necesarios a la fabricacion de mochilas, calzados y los articulos de uso deportivo y entro en la produccion dinamica.
					
					La Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang preparo el proceso de producir con las materias primas nacionales las telas para mochilas y la Fabrica de Souvenir del lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Mangyongdae acondiciono esta vez hasta el proceso productivo de cremalleras a estilo coreano, de manera que se posibilita entregar a los ninos y alumnos las mochilas hechas con las telas y cremalleras, producidas por las cremalleras y telas nacionales, senalo.
					
					Diciendo que es importante la mision de la planta, presento las tareas que le incumben a ella.
					
					Destaco que gracias al perfeccionamiento de los procesos productivos arriba mencionados en esta fabrica se ha preparado otra base productiva de articulos de consumo popular, basada en las fuerzas, tecnicas, materias primas y materiales nacionales, y mostro una gran alegria por haber cumplido el trabajo que queria hacer para el pueblo.
					
					Expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica cumpliran con su responsabilidad y deberes asumidos en los trabajos por mejorar la vida del pueblo y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron O Su Yong, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, An Jong Su, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won y Pak Myong Sun, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Federacion de Budistas de Corea rechaza intento de Park Geun-hye de colocar THAAD
articles.content:
Federacion de Budistas de Corea rechaza intento de Park Geun-hye de colocar THAAD
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Pese al fuerte rechazo y denuncia de los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes estratos, Park Geun-hye tomo la decision final de desplegar el sistema antimisiles norteamericano THAAD en el campo de golf de Songju de la provincia de Kyongsang del Norte donde se encuentra un "lugar sagrado" de Wonbulgyo. 
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea hizo publica el dia 7 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					Al lado del campo de golf, esta uno de los 4 "lugares sagrados" de Wonbulgyo. 
					
					Para los creyentes, el "lugar sagrado" se considera como sosten espiritual e intocable area de misa. 
					
					Sin embargo, la traidora Park Geun-hye va a introducir en ese lugar, simbolo de reconciliacion, cohesion y paz, el armamento mortifero de guerra nuclear, lo cual es el climax de fechoria que pueden cometer solo los barbaros. 
					
					La Federacion de Budistas de Corea califica el proceder de la camarilla traidora de Park de intolerable insulto a los budistas y crimen para acabar con la religion. 
					
					Para atropellar a la parte connacional, Park entrega sin escrupulos como base militar norteamericana hasta el "lugar sagrado" de los budistas que merece la proteccion especial. 
					
					El hecho demuestra de nuevo que ella es vendepatria pronorteamericana y corrupta sin par. 
					
					Si no se frustra el intento de los barbaros de colocar el THAAD, desaparece hoy un "lugar sagrado" de Wonbulgyo y se eliminara manana la misma creencia religiosa. Y se convertira el territorio patrio, cuna de vida de la nacion, en el campo de pugna y guerra nuclear entre las potencias. 
					
					Ahora, los creyentes surcoreanos de Wonbulgyo se movilizan a riesgo de la vida en la lucha contra el despliegue de THAAD considerando el acto profano de Park como declaracion de guerra para arrebatar a la fuerza el "lugar sagrado". 
					
					Hoy dia, la lucha contra THAAD no se limita a la defensa del "sagrado lugar", sino resulta la batalla justa y patriotica para defender la paz y seguridad de la patria y abrir la nueva era de reunificacion independiente, deseo unanime de toda la nacion.
					
					Enviando el apoyo total y solidaridad con la lucha de los creyentes de Wonbulgyo, el Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea expresa la esperanza y conviccion de que todos los religiosos surcoreanos, amantes de justicia y paz, se levantaran con dinamismo en la lucha por frustrar el intento de la psicopata Park Geun-hye de emplazar el THAAD y expulsar del suelo surcoreano a las tropas norteamericanas, por encima de las diferencias de religiones. 
					
					Sera condenada sin falta al castigo divino la horda de satanicos que profanan el "lugar sagrado" de Wonbulgyo tratando de convertirlo en un escenario de guerra.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun defiende voluntad de elevar la capacidad de autodefensa nacional
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun defiende voluntad de elevar la capacidad de autodefensa nacional
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, VOA, UPI y otros medios de Estados Unidos comentaron que el problema gravisima de EE.UU. es que no tiene el remedio para frenar ahora mismo las medidas intransigentes e inesperadas de la RPDC.
					Prosiguio que la RPDC realizo la prueba en el terreno de la expulsion del motor de gran capacidad de nuevo tipo para cohete transportador de satelite estacionario y este hecho insinua que se efectuara en un futuro cercano el lanzamiento de satelite artificial si se toma en consideracion el caso de la RPDC donde la orden del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un se cumple pronto como ley.
					
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico este viernes un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Son productos del espiritu de autofortalecimiento todas las creaciones monumentales hechas por la RPDC en los ultimos anos y sus exitos de la rama de ciencia y tecnica de defensa nacional que sorprenden hasta a las potencias militares.
					
					Nuestro pueblo creo incontables riquezas aun en medio de la permanente amenaza de agresion militar de los imperialistas yanquis y la sancion sin precedentes en la historia.
					
					Este hecho es una prueba contundente de que la sancion es infructifera en el trato con la RPDC que vivio siempre sancionada.
					
					En estos momentos tambien, los gobernantes norteamericanos se estan devanando los sesos para escoger cual tipo de sancion resultaria mas efectiva para el caso de la RPDC.
					
					Pero, la RPDC no teme a ninguna sancion de EE.UU.  
					
					Por muy desesperados que fueran los esfuerzos de EE.UU., no se cambiara nunca la posicion estrategica de la RPDC como potencia nuclear.
					
					Nuestro pais tiene la firme posicion de no vacilar ni retroceder en la via de consolidacion de autodefensa nacional.
					
					Al justipreciar la realidad, EE.UU. debe reflexionar seriamente de las consecuencias catastroficas que emanen de su anacronica campana de sancion y bloqueo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a EE.UU. y titeres surcoreanos al arruinamiento final
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a EE.UU. y titeres surcoreanos al arruinamiento final
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual de este viernes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la demencial campana de sancion y presion de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea deviene una absurdidad y acto suicida de los ignorantes del invencible poderio estatal e inagotable potencialidad de la potencia Paektusan, y continua:
					Convencidos de la justeza y victoria de su causa, los militares y civiles coreanos se han levantado como un solo hombre en la construccion de invencible potencia socialista bajo la direccion del gran Partido.
					
					Para ellos, no hay nada que temer aunque tropiecen con desafios mas brutales y la sancion y bloqueo mas fuertes que antes.
					
					Tienen la ferrea voluntad de exterminar a los traidores a la nacion y cumplir la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Mientras existan los traidores surcoreanos que tratan de desatar la guerra nuclear en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras rehusando la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, la nacion coreana no podra esperar la paz ni la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana ni eludir los desastres de guerra. 
					
					Aniquilar implacablemente a los maniacos de guerra es la justa opcion para defender la patria y la nacion, preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y lograr la reunificacion de la patria deseada tanto por toda la nacion. 
					
					En la batalla decisiva, en que se movilizaran todas las fuerzas armadas de la RPDC consolidadas bajo la bandera del Songun, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos sufriran el fin tragico y la nacion coreana acogera el maravilloso dia de reunificacion de la patria.
